name: 結華
text:
──っ、ダメだ
プロデューサー、電話繋がらない
trans:
It's no use. 
Producer's not picking up the phone.

name: 咲耶
text: そうか……
trans: I see...

name: 恋鐘
text:
玄関が開いとったってことは、
泥棒、今この階におるとやろか……！
trans:
The gate was open, 
does that mean that the thief is on this floor...?

name: 咲耶
text:
いや、プロデューサーが閉め忘れただけという可能性もある
まだ決めつけるのは早いんじゃないかい？
trans:
No, it could be that Producer forgot to close it. 
Isn't it too hasty to be jumping to conclusions?

name: 恋鐘
text:
そいやったら……もっかい確かめに行くばい……！
こんままじゃ、安心できんもん……
trans:
In that case... Let's go make sure again...! 
We can't relax at this rate...

name: 結華
text: 待った、それはさすがに危ないって
trans: Wait, that's really dangerous!

name: 摩美々
text:
三峰に同意ー
もし本当に泥棒がいて、鉢合わせたらどうするつもりー？
trans: I agree with Mitsumine. If there really was a thief, what will you do if you bumped into him?

name: 恋鐘
text:
そいはそうばってん……
なんもわからんままビクビクしとるのもよくなかよ……
trans:
That's true but... 
We can't leave things unanswered and continue bein' scared like this...

name: 霧子
text: 恋鐘ちゃん……
trans: Kogane...

name: 咲耶
text:
──よし、じゃあこうしよう
私と恋鐘のふたりで様子を見に行くんだ
trans:
Alright, then let's do this. 
Kogane and I will go have a look.

name: 咲耶
text:
全員で行くよりも動きやすいし
何かあってもお互いを助けられる……
trans:
It's easier to move around than with all of us going. 
And we'll be able to help each other out if anything happens...

name: 咲耶
text: だろう？
trans: Don't you think?

name: 恋鐘
text: 咲耶……！
trans: Sakuya...!

name: 結華
text: ……さくやん、それちゃんと自分の安全勘定に入れてる？
trans: ...Sakuyan, have you considered your own safety?

name: 結華
text:
こがたんが危ない時は自分が守ればいいから大丈夫って
思ってるだけじゃないよね？
trans: Don't tell me that you think that everything is fine, so long as you can protect Kogane if she was in trouble.

name: 恋鐘
text:
え～！？
うちもちゃんと咲耶のこと守るばい！
trans:
Eh!? 
I'll be able to protect Sakuya too!

name: 結華
text:
違う、こがたんのこと疑ってるわけじゃないの
さくやんが、人のことだけ考えてないかって確認
trans:
No, I'm not doubting you, Kogatan. 
I'm just making sure that Sakuyan isn't only thinking about others.

name: 結華
text:
さくやん、自分も女の子なんだってこと忘れてないよね？
──大丈夫だよね？
trans:
Sakuyan, you're not forgetting that you're also a girl right? 
You'll be fine, right?

name: 咲耶
text:
……フフ、もちろんだよ結華
心配してくれてありがとう
trans:
...Heh, of course Yuika. 
Thanks for worrying about me.

name: 咲耶
text:
もしもの時はふたりで逃げてくるつもりさ
無茶はしない。約束する
trans:
I'm thinking that we'll both run if something did happen. 
I won't be reckless, I promise.

name: 結華
text: ──おっけー、じゃあ問題なし
trans: OK, then everything's fine!

name: 結華
text:
危ないところ任せちゃうけど、
よろしく頼むよさくやん、こがたん！
trans: We'll be leaving this dangerous task to you, but we're counting on you Sakuyan, Kogatan!

name: 摩美々
text: まぁ、乗り気なら止めないケド……
trans: Well, if you want to I won't stop you...

name: 霧子
text: き、気を付けて……！
trans: P-Please be careful...!

name: 恋鐘＆咲耶
text: うん
trans: Alright!

name: 咲耶
text:
恋鐘、足元に注意して……
ゆっくり、私の後ろについておいで
trans:
Kogane, watch where you step... 
Slowly, follow behind me.

name: 恋鐘
text: うん……
trans: Yea...

name: 霧子
text:
何も……ありませんように……！
恋鐘ちゃん……咲耶さん……！
trans:
Please... Let there be nothing...! 
Kogane... Sakuya...!

name: 摩美々
text: ……もうちょっと落ち着いたらぁ……？
trans: ...How about calming down first...?

name: 摩美々
text:
こうやって私たちで見張りもしてるんだしー
咲耶と恋鐘も無茶しないって言ってたしー
trans:
We are here keeping watch. 
Plus Sakuya and Kogane said that they won't be reckless.

name: 霧子
text: 摩美々ちゃん……
trans: Mamimi...

name: 霧子
text:
そうだよね……
ふふ……ありがとう……
trans:
You're right... 
Fufu... Thank you...

name: 摩美々
text:
……お礼はいいんでー、
ちゃんとライト照らしてあげてくださぁい
trans:
...You don't have to thank me, 
make sure to shine the light properly.

name: 摩美々
text: 恋鐘たちの灯りだけじゃ足りないんだからぁ
trans: Kogane's light alone won't be enough.

name: 霧子
text: うん……！
trans: Yes...!

name: 恋鐘
text:
う、うわっ……！？
咲耶、あそこば見て……！？
trans:
A-Aah...!? 
Sakuya, look over there...!?

name: 咲耶
trans: ...This is...!

name: 摩美々＆霧子
trans: Ah!

name: 霧子
text: ふ、ふたりとも……！？
trans: Y-You two...!?

name: 摩美々
text: ちょっと、大丈夫──……！
trans: Hey, are you alright...!

name: 恋鐘
text:
わっ、ふたりとも！？
──心配せんでよかよ～！
trans:
Ah, it's you two!? 
Ya don't have to worry!

name: 恋鐘
text: うちらはなんともなか！
trans: Nothin' happened to us!

name: 咲耶
text: ただ、踊り場にこれが落ちていてね……
trans: It's just that, someone dropped this at the dance hall...

name: 霧子
text: ドライバー……？
trans: A screwdriver...?

name: 摩美々
text: ……窓割る時に使うって、聞いたことがある
trans: ...I heard that this is used to pry open windows.

name: 咲耶
text:
ああ
……また、状況が最悪に近づいてしまったようだ
trans:
Yeah. 
...It seems that the situation has turned for the worse.

name: 夏葉
text: ──泥棒がいるかもしれない、ですって？
trans: There might be a thief, you say?

name: 結華
text:
まだあくまで可能性の話ね！
実物を見たとかじゃないから
trans:
We're saying that it's just a possibility! 
It's not like we've actually seen one!

name: 結華
text:
とりあえず、この階の他の部屋は大丈夫だったんだけど、
今、うちのこがたんとさくやんが上を見に行ってる
trans: For now, the rooms in this floor are fine, currently, our Kogatan and Sakuyan went to check out the floor above.

name: 結華
text: だからみんなはここで──
trans: That's why you all just stay──

name: 果穂
text: ──探しに行きましょう！
trans: ──Let's go find him!

name: 結華
text: え
trans: Eh!?

name: 果穂
text:
事務所の危機を、放っておけません！
正義のヒーローは、悪に立ち向かうんです！
trans:
We can't leave things be when the office is in trouble! 
A hero of justice has to stand up to evil!

name: 結華
text: ま、待って果穂ちゃん！
trans: W-Wait a sec Kaho!

name: 結華
text:
えっと──ほら！　探しに行くのは、
こがたんとさくやんが頑張ってるから！
trans: Umm, you see! Kogatan and Sakuyan are doing their best to look for him!

name: 果穂
text: で、でも……
trans: B-but...

name: 樹里
text: 果穂、こういう時は役割分担だ
trans: Kaho, we have our own roles to fulfill in times like these.

name: 樹里
text:
悪いやつがいるかもしれないんだったら、
ヒーロー同士協力しなくちゃだろ？
trans: When there might be an evildoer around, as fellow heroes, don't we have to work together?

name: 果穂
text: 協力……ですか……？
trans: Work together.... you say...?

name: 樹里
text:
ああ。上の階を調べるのは、恋鐘と咲耶がやってくれてる
だったらアタシたちは違うことをやらねーと
trans:
Yeah. Kogane and Sakuya are already searching the floor above. 
In that case, we have to do something different.

name: 智代子
text:
そうだよー果穂、
パーティーの料理はみんなの楽しみだもん
trans:
That's right, Kaho! 
The party food is something everyone is looking forward to!

name: 智代子
text: それを守るのもヒーローのお仕事だと思うな
trans: And protecting that is also the work of a hero, I think!

name: 樹里
text: だからさ──頼めるか？
trans: That's why, can we leave that to you?

name: 果穂
text:
樹里ちゃん……！　ちょこ先輩……！
あたし、お料理守るの、頑張りますっ……！
trans:
Juri...! Choco-senpai...! 
I'll do my best to protect the food...!

name: 樹里
text: おう
trans: Yeah.

name: 智代子
text: うんっ
trans: Yup.

name: 結華
text: はぁ……
trans: Haa...

name: 結華
text:
助かったよ……
ありがとう、じゅりちー、チョコ
trans:
You're a lifesaver... 
Thanks, Jurichii, Choco.

name: 樹里
text: ん
trans: Yeah.

name: 智代子
text: いえいえ～
trans: No problem.

name: 結華
text:
──とりあえず、偵察はうちがやっておくから、
みんなはここで料理のこと、よろしく
trans: So at the moment, we'll be doing the searching, we leave the food to you all over here.

name: 果穂
text: はいっ
trans: OK.

name: 樹里
text:
……でも、何かあったら遠慮なく言えよ
アタシたちにも手伝えることがあれば──
trans:
...But, if anything happens don't be hesitant to ask us.
If there's anything that we can help with──

name: 摩美々
text: はぁい、偵察班からお知らせでーす
trans: Hey, a message from the scout unit.

name: 結華
text: まみみん！　そっちはどうだった？
trans: Mamimin! How did it go on your side?

name: 摩美々
text: 恋鐘も咲耶も無事だケド……階段に、これが
trans: Kogane and Sakuya are fine but... This was found at the stairway.

name: 結華
text: これ……
trans: This is...

name: 夏葉
text:
……穏やかじゃないものが落ちてたわね
窓でも割ったのかしら
trans: ...Someone dropped something dangerous like this, I wonder if one of the windows got pried.

name: 摩美々
text: その可能性も捨てきれないかとー
trans: We can't rule out that possibility.

name: 摩美々
text:
……暗かったしー……、
３階まではちょっと……行かせられなかったぁ……
trans:
...It was dark... 
So we couldn't... let them go to the third floor...

name: 摩美々
text: この後どうするかは、今向こうで相談を──
trans: On their side, they're discussing what we should do now.

name: 樹里
text: ──今度はアタシが見に行く
trans: I'll go take a look this time.

name: 智代子
text: えっ！？
trans: Eh!?

name: 樹里
text:
任せっぱなしってわけにはいかねーだろ
アタシだったら──
trans:
We can't just leave everything 
to them If it was me.

name: 智代子
text:
まっ、待って樹里ちゃん！
外暗いって言ってたし、私が行くよ！
trans:
W-Wait up Juri! 
They said that it's dark outside, so I'll go!

name: 樹里
text:
は！？
なんでだよ！　チョコ、暗いのダメだろ！？
trans:
What!? Why!? 
Choco, I thought that you were afraid of the dark!?

name: 智代子
text:
わ、私は凛世ちゃんのおかげで
その辺克服したから大丈夫だもん！　いけるって！
trans:
I-I've gotten over it to an extent thanks to Rinze, so I'll be fine! 
I can do it!

name: 樹里
text: あれは大丈夫ってレベルじゃ──
trans: That's not something that you can just be fine with──

name: 夏葉
text:
落ち着いて
話を聞く限り、暗闇を克服したという智代子の方が適任だわ
trans: Calm down. From what the both of you are saying, Chiyoko will be more suited for the job as she's gotten over her fear of the dark.

name: 夏葉
text: 樹里。アナタ、暗いのは苦手でしょう？
trans: Juri, you're still afraid of the dark aren't you?

name: 樹里
text:
それはそうだけど！
でも、チョコひとりで行かせるのだって危ねーって！
trans:
That's true but! 
But, leaving Choco to go alone is dangerous!

name: 夏葉
text:
心配しないで、最初からひとりで行かせるつもりはないわ
私もついていく
trans: Don't worry, I wasn't planning to have her go alone in the first place. I'll go as well.

name: 智代子
text: 夏葉ちゃん……！
trans: Natsuha...!

name: 樹里
text:
おい待てよ！　アタシがダメなら夏葉もダメだろ！？
アタシより暗いの得意とは言わせねーぞ
trans: Hey stop! You're one to say, but aren't you afraid of the dark too Natsuha!? And don't you dare say that you're better with the dark than me.

name: 夏葉
text: いいえ。ただ暗いだけなら平気よ
trans: No. I'm fine if it's just the darkness.

name: 夏葉
text:
私が肝試しの時に後れを取ったのは、
お化けという曖昧な存在が相手だったからだもの
trans: The reason I lost during the test of courage was because we were facing the vague existence known as ghosts.

name: 夏葉
text:
今回の相手は恐らく『人間』
暴漢の対処なら心得ているし、見える相手なら問題ないわ！
trans: Now that we're probably facing a "Human" this time, and I know some self-defence, if I could see who we're up against then there's no problem!

name: 樹里
text: お前なぁ……
trans: Oh you...

name: 夏葉
text:
それに、この先何が起こるかはわからないもの
戦力は残しておかなくちゃ
trans: Plus, we have no idea what'll happen moving forward, we'll need to reserve some of our fighting strength.

name: 夏葉
text: 誰かが果穂と一緒に料理を守る必要があるでしょう？
trans: Won't we need someone to stay with Kaho to protect the food?

name: 夏葉
text: これはアナタの実力を見込んでのことでもあるのよ！
trans: This is only possible after considering what you can do!

name: 樹里
text:
あー……もう……！
わかったよ……
trans:
Argh... sheesh...! 
Got it...

name: 夏葉
text: ありがとう、樹里
trans: Thanks, Juri.

name: 夏葉
text:
それに果穂も。クリスマスパーティーの成功は、
アナタたちの頑張りにかかっているのよ
trans: Also to you, Kaho. The success of the Christmas party will depend on the hard work by the two of you.

name: 果穂
text:
は、はいっ……！
お、お料理は、絶対に守ってみせます……！
trans:
Y-Yes...! 
I-I'll do my best to protect the food...!

name: 夏葉
text: 頼もしいわ
trans: That's reassuring.

name: 夏葉
text:
──ということだから、結華、摩美々
今度はアナタたちが待っていて
trans:
And that's how it is, Yuika, Mamimi. 
This time, please wait for us.

name: 摩美々
text:
はぁい
気を付けてー……
trans:
Alright. 
Be careful...

name: 結華
text:
他のみんなには、状況、こっちから伝えとくよ
……お節介かもだけど、無理しないように
trans:
We'll let the others know of the situation from here. 
...This might be unneeded, but don't overdo it.

name: 夏葉
text: ──当然
trans: Of course.

name: 夏葉
text: 不審者とやらの尻尾、必ず捕まえてみせるわよ！
trans: We'll definitely catch on to the trail of this so-called intruder!
